original_text: Instead, you must live with the Lord Jesus Christ as your guide. Do not even think about the bad things that you may want to do to make yourself happy.
korean_text: 오직 주 예수 그리스도로 옷 입고 정욕을 위하여 육신의 일을 도모하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Instead, you must live with the Lord Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 당신은 주 예수 그리스도와 함께 살아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Do not even think about the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 나쁜 것들에 대해 생각조차 하지 마세요

sentences.original_text: that you may want to do
